Subject: Major Incident Resolved: users unable to access VPN at HO1 and D3.
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

We have now confirmed that the VPN issue impacting HO1 and D3 locations has been resolved.  All users are now able to successfully connect, and Infosys are able to provide remote support capability. 

 

Impacted Locations:

â€¢   HO1 and D3

 

Start Date and Time: Mon, 1 Sep 11.00 AM

 End Time: Mon, 1 Sep 14.10 PM

 

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.
